ContactProfile.name: ContactProfile
ContactProfile.description: Represents information about an individual, such as their ethnicity, citizenship, birth place, race, and so on.

AdvancementGraduationDate.description: The date of the person's first graduation from your institution.

AdvancementType.description: The classification that matches the role or relationship of the person with the institution.

ContactId.description: The contact associated with the contact profile record.

Ethnicity.description: Specifies the ethnicity of the individual.

GenerationalCohort.description: The person's age group, or generational cohort, based on their birth date.

GraduationAchievement.description: Specifies the person's highest achievement on graduation.

GraduationCohort.description: The group of graduates the person belongs to based on their graduation date.

HasFerpaParentalDisclosure.description: Indicates permission to make FERPA Parental Disclosure (true) or not (false).

HasFerpaThrdPtyDisclosure.description: Indicates permission to make FERPA Third-Party Disclosure (true) or not (false).

HighestEducationLevel.description: Specifies the highest educational qualification of the individual

IsFirstGenerationStudent.description: Indicates whether the individual is the first generation to enroll in education beyond high school.

IsLocked.description: Indicates whether the record is locked (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate) but not viewed it.

Location.description: The location where the contact currently resides.

MayEdit.description: Indicates whether the record can be edited (true) or not (false).

MilitaryBranch.description: Specifies the military branch if the individual has ever enlisted in the military.

MilitaryService.description: Specifies the current status of military service.

PrimaryCitizenshipId.description: The primary citizenship held by the individual.

PrimaryCitizenshipType.description: Specifies the type of primary citizenship held by the individual.

Race.description: Specifies the race of the individual.

SecondaryCitizenshipId.description: The secondary citizenship of the individual if they hold dual citizenship.

SecondaryCitizenshipType.description: Specifies the type of secondary citizenship held by the individual.

Website.description: A website thatâ€™s associated with the contact.
